key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowAssembly
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows reassmebly of the document by default.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowCopy
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows copying of the document's contents by default.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowDegradedPrinting
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows low quality printing of the document's contents by default.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowFillIn
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows the fill-in of document forms (inputfields etc).

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowModifyAnnotations
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows document annotations by default.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowModifyContents
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows modifying of the document by default.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.PrintLevel
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows printing of the document's contents by default. Set to 'none' for disallowing printing altogether, 'degraded' for a low resolution print-out or 'full' for full printing.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowScreenReader
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows access for screenreaders by default. Although this could make it easier to grab the contents your PDF document, enabling this property will allow blind people to access your content. It is usually a good idea to always enable this property.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Author
key.description: The author string of the document.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.DeviceResolution
key.description: Adjusts the resultion of the images embedded in the PDF. By default we use 150 DPI, which is slightly better than 72DPI and a good compromise between size and quality. For real high-quality printing you probably want to increase that to 300 or more.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.EmbedFonts
key.description: Defines whether to embed fonts in the generated PDF. This will result in larger PDF files, but makes sure that all characters are displayed properly.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Encoding
key.description:
The default font-encoding for the OutputTarget. Can be changed with PDFOutputTarget.setFontEncoding for the specific instance if needed.
The encoding can also be defined on a per-element level.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Encryption
key.description:
Defines whether the PDF file should be encrypted by default. Set this to "none" "40bit" or "128bit".
Access restrictions have no effect if the document is not encrypted, and not all security settings are active on 40-Bit encryption.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.OwnerPassword
key.description:
Defines the OwnerPassword for the PDF document. The owner has all perfmissions on the document and will be able to change the security settings.
Warning: Specifying passwords in the property file can introduce a security risk. Do not use these settings on the client side or in unprotected (world-readable) server environments. In these cases use other means of defining the password.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.PrintLevel
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows printing of the document's contents by default.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Title
key.description: The title of the document.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.UseNativeScaling
key.description:
Defines, whether the PDF export uses a native scaling algorithm. This basically means that the images are embedded unscaled and that the generated PDF contains hints for the PDF-Viewer to display the embedded image in the correct size.
Setting this property to 'true' can result in smaller PDF file sizes.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.UserPassword
key.description:
The default user password for the document. Users are able to access the document within the defined security restrictions.
Warning: Specifying passwords in the property file can introduce a security risk. Do not use these settings on the client side or in unprotected (world-readable) server environments. In these cases use other means of defining the password.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Version
key.description:
Defines the specification version of the generated document. This should be set to either "1.2", "1.3", "1.4" or "1.5"
This setting defaults to "1.4".

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.WatermarkPrinted
key.description: Defines, whether the Watermarks-Section will be evaluated by the PDF output processor. This defaults to true.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.PageLayout
key.description: Defines, the page layout used when pening the document. This defaults to PageLayoutSinglePage.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.PageMode
key.description: Defines, the page mode used when pening the document. This defaults to PageModeUseNone

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.FullScreenMode
key.description: If page mode is "PageModeFullScreen" then this setting can be used to define how to display the document on exiting full-screen mode.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.HideToolBar
key.description: Hides the toolbar when the document is opened.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.HideMenuBar
key.description: Hides the menu bar when the document is opened.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.HideWindowUI
key.description: Hides user-interface elements in the document's window (such as scroll bars and navigation controls) leaving only the document's contents displayed.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.FitWindow
key.description: Resizes the document's window to fit the size of the first displayed page.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.CenterWindow
key.description: Positions the document's window in the centre of the screen.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.DisplayDocTitle
key.description: Display's the title that was added to the metadata in the top bar. Otherwise, the filename is displayed.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.PrintScalingNone
key.description: Indicates that the print dialog should reflect no page scaling.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Direction
key.description: Defines the reading direction. Default Left to right. Right to left supports vertical writing systems such as Chinese, Japanese and Korean
